data:
Niclas joined ULFBUILT in early 2017. He has a BS degree in Accounting/Finance and a background as an Assistant Controller and Financial Analyst. Niclas also has an extensive background working in the customer service business, including the hotel and ski industry.

Niclas is calm, patient and has an eye for the details. Heâ€™s constantly looking for ways to improve current processes by challenging the status quo. Niclas volunteers wherever he is needed so in addition to handling Finance, IT, Marketing, and HR, he can be found assisting at job sites, delivering materials and supporting the ULFBUILT team.

Niclas is originally from Sweden, and moved to the Vail Valley in 1997 to work as a Ski Instructor. After a few years he met his wife Tanya and now they have two beautiful boys.

Niclas and his family enjoy skiing, mountain biking, golfing, camping, and everything else the Vail Valley offers.
